entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this evening then partly cloudy. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this evening then increasing to 40 gusting to 70 near midnight. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023
